mutants.code:
def findLargestSum(arr):
    arr.sort()
    maxSum = float('')
    currentSum = float('-inf')
    pair = []
    n = len(arr)
    for i in range(n - 1, 0, -1):
        currentSum = arr[i] + arr[i - 1]
        if currentSum > maxSum:
            maxSum = currentSum
            pair = [arr[i], arr[i - 1]]
    return pair
